eptandemms 0.1.0
  • Reference

    Get a table of fragments

    fragments.Rd

    fragments() Generates a table of fragments from a given peptide character string

    fragments(
  sequence = "SAMPLE",
  type = c("y", "b"),
  charge = c(1, 2, 3, 4),
  loss = NULL
)

    Arguments

    sequence

    a character string

    type

    a character

    charge

    an integer

    loss

    a character string

    Value

    a tibble

    Examples

    library(rpsm)
#> Error in library(rpsm): there is no package called ‘rpsm’
fragments("SAMPLER")
#>        ion        mz z     seq pair pos      type
#> 1   b1++++  22.76528 4       S  p01   1         b
#> 2    b1+++  30.01794 3       S  p01   1         b
